content: I've been playing a lot of games lately, especially since I upgraded my PC with a new graphics card, and I'm really loving the fast-paced action. I've been playing Overwatch with my friends almost daily, trying out different heroes and strategies. I've been maining Reaper lately, but I've also been experimenting with Widowmaker. I managed to reach level 50 and unlocked the "Hero of Numbani" spray, which I'm really proud of.
